entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
